name: Crackling Axe Mitachurl
desc:
Muscular hilichurls who wield large, two-handed axes.
Attacks with large strikes and uses Electro Slimes to infuse their axes with Electro. Their blows are very lethal.
Axes forged from steel are highly conductive material. The image of those tall and strong Crackling Axe Mitachurls holding their axes up to summon lightning is quite majestic to the hilichurls.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Heavy Horn
dropMaterial.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

dropMaterial.name: Black Bronze Horn
dropMaterial.desc: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

dropMaterial.name: Black Crystal Horn
dropMaterial.desc: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.

dropMaterial.name: Damaged Mask
dropMaterial.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

dropMaterial.name: Stained Mask
dropMaterial.desc:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

dropMaterial.name: Ominous Mask
dropMaterial.desc:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

dropMaterial.name: Dull Blade
dropMaterial.desc: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then make it up with valiance.

dropMaterial.name: Silver Sword
dropMaterial.desc: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

dropMaterial.name: Hunter's Bow
dropMaterial.desc: A hunter's music consists of but two sounds: the twang of the bowstring and the whoosh of soaring arrows.

dropMaterial.name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow
dropMaterial.desc: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

dropMaterial.name: Apprentice's Notes
dropMaterial.desc: Notes left behind by a top student. Many useful spells are listed, and the handwriting is beautiful.

dropMaterial.name: Pocket Grimoire
dropMaterial.desc: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magic exam.

dropMaterial.name: Waster Greatsword
dropMaterial.desc: A sturdy sheet of iron that may be powerful enough to break apart mountains if wielded with enough willpower.

dropMaterial.name: Old Merc's Pal
dropMaterial.desc: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

dropMaterial.name: Beginner's Protector
dropMaterial.desc: A polearm as straight as a flag pole. Well suited to most combat situations, it has an imposing presence when swung.

dropMaterial.name: Iron Point
dropMaterial.desc: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.
